{docbook}
<abstract>
 <para>This chapter supplies you with the basic knowledge about templates, UI extension, APIs in Content. Through it, you can build your own content.  Also, with the step-by-step guides, you can create UI extension, deploy a workflow in Content and do many different actions.</para>
 <para>This chapter consists of the main following contents:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.InsideWCMTemplates">WCM Templates</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para> Information about Content types used in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.InsideWCMExplorer">WCM Explorer</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Introduction about CSS files and CKEditor applied in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions">Extensions</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Knowledge about extensions in the Content function, such as REST services, UI extensions, authoring extensions and more.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Dev_CMIS.Usage_code_examples">CMIS Usage code examples</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Examples of CMIS usage code which may be useful for developers who need to access a repository.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Devref.PublicRestAPIs">Public REST APIs</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information (such as name, service URL, parameter, and description) on Public REST APIs used in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices">Public Java APIs</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information on public Java APIs used in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Deprecated_portlets">Deprecated portlets</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>A list of deprecated portlets in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Adm_CMIS.Miscellaneous_tips">Miscellaneous and Tips</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>List of reference links for xCMIS project and CMIS.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.FAQ">FAQ</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>List of FAQ related to the product.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
